QuestData.Title: Finding Your Way
QuestData.Description:
Orgrimmar's a big city. Way too big to explore on foot. Warlord Grimaxe has arranged for you to receive a mount to help you get around.
She said to speak with Rohaka at the stables... but I can't seem to remember the way there.
Don't worry, $n! All we need to do is ask a guard for directions. If you ever need help finding something, the city guards will show you where to go.
Let's ask a nearby guard for directions to the stable master. Then we can be on our way!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Rohaka Tuskmaul at the stables.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Rohaka Tuskmaul at the stables.

Objectives.Objective: Ask a guard for directions to the Stable Master
Follow Cork Fizzlepop to the Stables
